ing: 1 (750 milliliter) bottle chardonnay wine (such as WenteÂ®)
1 cup elderflower liqueur (such as St. GermainÂ®)
1/2 cup fresh raspberries, or more to taste
1/2 cup fresh blueberries, or more to taste
1/2 cup fresh blackberries, or more to taste
n: White Peach Spring Sangria with Elderflower Liqueur
des: "A delicious and refreshing white peach sangria recipe using WenteÂ® chardonnay and St. GermaineÂ® liqueur!"
ins:
Pour chardonnay and elderflower liqueur into a pitcher; add peaches, strawberries, raspberries, blueberries, and blackberries. Stir and let fruit soak for at least 2 hours.
Fill wine glasses with ice and pour in sangria.
